name: Urbit
intro: A clean-slate OS and network for the 21st century.
introduce: Urbit is a peer-to-peer computer network that runs an operating system (OS) aims to give users digital autonomy. Urbit comprises two pieces of technology: Peer-to-Peer Computer Network (Urbit ID), which is a distributed identity and public key infrastructure (PKI) for general-purpose authentication; Operating System (Urbit OS), which is a virtual computing platform built from the ground up. It is completely sealed from the system it runs on, somewhat like Web Assembly (WASM) or the Java Virtual Machine (JVM).
